Ini Cara Sukses Berdagang seperti Rasulullah
06 Nov 2019, 22:16 by Puti Yasmin


Ini Cara Sukses Berdagang seperti Rasulullah/Foto: Selfie Miftahul Jannah

Jakarta - Nabi Muhammad diketahui sebagai utusan Allah yang menyampaikan wahyu di bumi. Selain itu, Rasulullah juga dikenal piawai berdagang. Lantas, seperti apa cara Rasulullah berdagang?Prinsip bisnis Rasulullah juga berdasarkan ilmu dagang dalam Al Quran. Bahkan, ia mengingatkan bahwa akan datang suatu zaman di mana orang tidak peduli dari mana harta itu datang.Arab: لَيَأْتِيَنَّ عَلَى النَّاسِ زَمَانٌ لاَ يُبَالِى الْمَرْءُ بِمَا أَخَذَ الْمَالَ ، أَمِنْ حَلاَلٍ أَمْ مِنْ حَرَامٍArtinya: akan datang suatu zaman di mana manusia tidak lagi peduli dari mana mereka mendapatkan harta, apakah dari usaha yang halal atau yang haram.Berikut cara rasulullah berdagang yang dirangkum detikcom:Ada beberapa hal yang perlu diperhatikan dari cara Rasul berdagang. Pertama melakukan segmentasi, kemudian menetapkan target pasar, dan positioning.Dikutip dari NU Online, cara Rasulullah berdagang selalu membawa kesuksesan. Pasalnya, ia pintar dalam memposisikan diri serta menghormati pelanggannya. Ia juga tidak pernah mengecewakan pelanggannya.Selain itu, Rasulullah diketahui pintar dalam memasarkan dagangannya. Ia berdagang dengan cara yang berbeda-beda, misalnya menjalin hubungan baik (silaturahmi) dengan pelanggan, serta ekspansi usaha ke wilayah lainnya.Kemudian, cara Rasulullah berdagang juga diketahui jujur. Ia tidak pernah menipu dalam mendeskripsikan barang, tidak bersumpah berlebihan, jujur dalam timbangan dan takaran, serta tidak memonopoli komoditas.Nah, tertarik belajar cara Rasulullah beragang kan? This is a successful way of trading like the Prophet
Nov 6, 2019, 22:16 by Puti Yasmin


This is the Successful Way of Trading like Rasulullah / Photo: Selfie Miftahul Jannah

Jakarta - The Prophet Muhammad is known as the messenger of God who gave revelations on earth. In addition, the Messenger of Allah is also known for trading expertise. So, what is the way of the Prophet trading? The business principles of the Prophet are also based on trade knowledge in the Qur'an. In fact, he warned that there will come a time when people do not care where the treasure was datang.Arab: ليأتين على الناس زمان لا يبالى المرء بما أخذ المال, أمن حلال أم من حرام means: will come a time when man no longer cares of where they get wealth, whether from a business that is lawful or unlawful. Following the way the Messenger of Allah traded summarized: There are several things that need to be considered from the way the Apostle traded. First do the segmentation, then set the target market, and positioning. Quoted from NU Online, the way the Prophet trades always brings success. Because, he is smart in positioning themselves and respect their customers. He also never disappointed his customers. In addition, the Prophet was known to be smart in marketing his wares. He traded in different ways, for example establishing good relations (friendship) with customers, as well as business expansion to other regions. Then, the way the Prophet traded was also known to be honest. He never deceived in describing goods, did not swear excessively, was honest in weighing and measuring, and did not monopolize commodities. Well, interested in learning how the Prophet traded, right?
